pair.value: Check if documents have been uploaded to the new record.

form-element.label: Document
form-element.instructions: Choose the document you want to delete.
form-element.name: Question2

pair.value: Create a folder to hold documents associated with this record.

form-element.label: Create Folder. Choose either a parent Knowledge Center or Folder, but not both.
form-element.name: Message1

pair.value: Move any uploaded documents into the record folder, from the app-wide temporary folder where the start form uploaded them.

form-element.label: Document
form-element.instructions: Choose the document you want to move
form-element.name: Question2

pair.value: Set the folder security to include all users of the app, to make sure there are no failures uploading documents to the record.
Set the folder security to include the newly-create group, to make sure there are no failures uploading documents to the record.

form-element.label: Folder
form-element.instructions: Choose the folder you want to set security for.
form-element.name: Question2

pair.value: Write the new record to DB.
Write New Entry to Activity DSE
Write New Entry to Activity DSE
Write the activity entry to DB.

acp.name: recordActivity
